content: I'm Tim Erickson, and I'm participating from the north woods of Minnesota this week, where I am sheltering in place with my parents. My big project for the last week has been planning a new "Build a Website with Backdrop CMS" class targeted at beginners.

I won't be here much longer (bed soon), but I'm working on a PR that'll make all future PRs against Backdrop core use Tugboat.qa for sandbox sites (i.e. the site where you can test your PR live).

Tugboat.qa: a pull request builder and user feedback platform for web development teams
Tugboat enables anyone to visually see what the site will look like for any snapshot of code before itâs merged into production as a working website.

I'm Jen Lampton, and I'm participating from the SF Bay Area, where I am sheltering in place with my husband, a good friend, our dog, and 2 cats. This week I am working on a presentation on upgrading from Drupal 7 to Backdrop CMS for Stanford Web Camp on Friday :)
@jenlampton is stanfford web camp remote and is there a link to the session somewhere?

I'm Greg. Self-isolated in our apartment in central Greece, while the rest of the family is at the village, 30min away. Not working on anything in particular, and actual job-work starts in about 1.5hrs. ...here to help however I can.
Yes! https://webcamp.stanford.edu/sessions @Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy)

I'm Laryn, under a "stay at home" order in Memphis, TN. Currently brainstorming about some possible integrations for a nonprofit site (including a partner that uses Classy.org and is hoping I can weave that in a little more seamlessly than their Drupal 7 site does it).

Online Fundraising For The Modern Nonprofit | Classy
Classy’s online fundraising platform gives nonprofits easy, effective, and customizable solutions to manage your fundraising efforts. Try it here for free.

Thanks everyone for checking in and saying "hi." I believe that the intention is to keep Wednesday office hours going for the foreseeable future. Maybe "office hours" and "co-working/mentoring."

I like the idea about a weekly checkin as well. How do others feel?
I like the idea too @StPaulTim

I'm going to start another round of introductions or check-ins for this week.

I'm Tim Erickson and am still working in the North Woods of Minnesota from my parents home. Been here 2.5 weeks and expect I'll be here another few weeks at least. Along with the deer, wild turkeys, and bald eagles I have access to good internet, so I'm fine.

For the last week or two, most of my Backdrop activity has been around creating Backdrop CMS screencasts. I'm taking requests.
YouTube - Team Triplo
I'm Geoff and I'm taking requests for development how tos; If you'd like to see some dev task outlined leave a request on https://howtobackdrop.com

@Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) - I posted a request for video "how to" on writing tests for Backdrop Core. If that works. I've have some friends who are interested in that. I might not be ready myself.
that's great; I'll see what I can whip up;
@Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) ++
(serundeputy)** Cheers (Karma: 7)
@StPaulTim do you know of any issues that are currently in need of tests? i'm looking for one that would help me create this testing howto;
Drat I'm writing tests as we speak.
@docwilmot record it!
Sorry I'm already done.
heheeh; no worries; @docwilmot ++
docwilmot great work (Karma: 4)
@Herb do you have an example of a settings.php or settings.local.php file that makes use of the new ability to turn off caching and stuff like that ?
@Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) do you mean the settings override?
@Herb yes;

@Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) you'll see an example in the tests. https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/blob/c2967cde3063294d9ad3e51294a8a6891a17817d/core/modules/config/tests/config.test#L96 which has this: $config['config.test']['foo.key1'] = 'chocolate'

backdrop/backdrop
Backdrop core code repository. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop development by creating an account on GitHub.
so this $GLOBALS['config']['config.test']['foo.key1'] = 'chocolate'; is what we put in our settings.local.php file to override ?

@Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) Still looking for issues that need tests?
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4360#issuecomment-607928891

Can't save the setting to use the installation profile cache · Issue #4360 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Actual behavior When you change the value of the 'Cache installation profiles' setting on /admin/config/development/testing/settings and click save, it is not saved. Expected behavior When ...
@Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) more like $config['config.test']['foo.key1'] = 'chocolate'
